text: Saint Vincent and the Grenadines competed at the 2000 Summer Olympics in Sydney, Australia with two track and field athletes and two swimmers. ==Athletics== ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font- size:95%" !Result !Rank |-align=center |align=left|Pamenos Ballantyne |align=left|marathon |2-19.08 |31 |} ;Women {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Quarterfinals !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Result !Rank !Result !Rank !Result !Rank !Result !Rank |-align=center |align=left|Natasha Mayers |align=left|100 m |11.61 |4 |colspan=6|Did not advance |} ==Swimming== ;Men {|class=wikitable style="font- size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |-align=center |align=left|Stephenson Wallace |align=left|50 m freestyle |27.84 |72 |colspan=4| Did not advance |} ;Women {|class=wikitable style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |-align=center |align=left|Teran Matthews |align=left|50 m freestyle |31.71 |67 |colspan=4| Did not advance |} ==See also== * Saint Vincent and the Grenadines at the 1998 Commonwealth Games * Saint Vincent and the Grenadines at the 1999 Pan American Games * Saint Vincent and the Grenadines at the 2002 Commonwealth Games ==References== *Official Olympic Reports *sports-reference Category:Nations at the 2000 Summer Olympics 2000
title: Saint Vincent and the Grenadines at the 2000 Summer Olympics
